ing: 1 (8 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
des: "This salad is a real conversation piece. Whoever heard of popcorn in a salad? If you take it to a dinner, mix the salad and carry the popcorn separately to be added at the last minute."
ins:
Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain, crumble and set aside.
In a large bowl, combine the mayonnaise, celery, 1 cup of the cheese, water chestnuts, 1/2 cup bacon, carrots and chives.  Mix well.  Add popcorn and stir to coat.  Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bacon and serve immediately.
